testcase.name: should have defined countOfMsg and portionOfMsg (custom or default)
should have countOfMsg = 10 and portionOfMsg = 2 by default
should have integer countOfMsg and portionOfMsg
checkTypeOfMsg() may be called with 'start', 'stop' or () for both. Else -> catch an ERROR
makeMsg() may be called with string args 'stop' or 'start'. Else -> catch an ERROR
makeMsg() should return an Array like ['<string>', {<object>}]
sendMsg.interval should be called with function
